content.prompt: What type of cadence and nonharmonic tone are illustrated above?

choices.label: An imperfect authentic cadence with an appoggiatura
A perfect authentic cadence with an escape tone (échapée)
A plagal cadence with a passing tone
A deceptive cadence with a neighboring tone

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in notated music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
